name: Fightink Farber
description:
Created entirely from scratch in 72 hours as an entry for the Mini Jam 62: Colors (Limitation: all animations must only use two frames)!

You are on your way to stop the evil wizard Farber, who took over the castle! Can you bring peace to the kingdom by puzzling your way through this platformer that is all about colors?

Movement: A/D or Left/Right Arrow (Gamepad MIGHT work as well). Space to Jump. R to quickly restart the level. Do note that any devices without keyboard or controller input, such as smartphones, are currently not supported.

All resources used in this game are to the best of our knowledge either created by us or part of the public domain. We greatly appreciate the contribution of those respective authors.

UPDATE 7.9.2020, 16:26: Tweaked some levels so they are a bit easier and people can actually get to the final boss.

UPDATE 7.9.2020, 23:42: Greatly improved the compatibility with ALL resolutions, so the game runs on all screens without issues.
